name: tolerianeDermoCleanser
properties: Make-up remover and cleanser for all types of intolerant skin
instructions: Apply a knob of product to your fingertips and massage in light circular motions. Gently dab your face without rubbing. Optional rinsing
ingredients: AQUA / WATER • ETHYLHEXYL PALMITATE • GLYCERIN • DIPROPYLENE GLYCOL • CARBOMER • SODIUM HYDROXIDE • CAPRYL GLYCOL / CAPRYLYL GLYCOL • ETHYLHEXYLGLYCERIN
